data.name: Accordion2Paragraph1
data.value: If you don’t have a phone line you’ll need to pay a ‘New line provision’ charge of £60.

data.name: Accordion3LinkAlt
data.value: Link to see our broadband regulatory information

data.name: Accordion3LinkText
data.value: Broadband Traffic Management and Acceptable use policy.

data.name: Accordion3LinkUrl
data.value: https://sse.co.uk/help/phone-and-broadband/regulations-broadband

data.name: Accordion3Paragraph1
data.value: Unlimited downloads are subject to our

data.name: Accordion6Paragraph1
data.value: Your account will have paperless billing as standard. If you’d like paper billing, you can choose this option on your online account. This will add a monthly charge of £2 to your bill.

data.name: Accordion7Paragraph1
data.value: Any call features you have with your current provider may be transferred to us. These features are listed in the SSE Phone Product and Price Guide, and some will involve an ongoing monthly charge. If you’d like to add or change any of these call features, please get in touch after your phone service starts.

data.name: Header
data.value: Order summary

data.name: Legend
data.value: Do you agree to the terms and conditions and other Important information above?

data.name: InstallationHeader
data.value: About your £60 phone line installation fee

data.name: InstallationParagraph
data.value: It doesn’t look like you have an active Openreach/BT phone line, so we'll contact you to arrange a date for an engineer to install one. We'll let you know if they need access to your home as you'll need to be there. There's a one-off charge of £60 which we'll add to a future bill.

data.name: PackageTableHeader
data.value: Package details

data.name: Paragraph
data.value: We’ll look to move your existing phone number across to us. If we can’t do this, we’ll give you a new phone number.

data.name: Paragraph2
data.value: You can cancel your order without paying anything up to 5pm on the working day before your start date. If you can, please give us 48-hours’ notice. You can cancel by calling 0345 071 9886, by email to talk.cancellations@sse.com, by writing to us at Customer Service, PO Box 230, Havant, PO9 9DT or by completing and sending us the cancellation form in your welcome pack.

data.value: Legal and regulatory information

data.value: Personal details

data.name: SSECustomerDisclaimer
data.value: This price is based on you being an SSE Energy customer. It may change if we confirm otherwise.

data.name: SubHeader
data.value: Your landline number

data.name: SubHeader2
data.value: If you change your mind

data.name: Title
data.value: Sign up to phone and broadband – Your order summary - SSE

data.name: NoLandlineHeader
data.value: Your new landline number

data.name: NoLandlineParagraph
data.value: As you haven’t given us a landline number, or don’t have one, we’ll give you a new one. We’ll tell you what your number is once you’re set up.

data.name: SwitchHeader
data.value: About your switch

data.name: SwitchParagraph
data.value: We’ll contact your current provider to let them know you’re switching to us. Switching takes around 18 to 20 days for most customers.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsAriaDescription
data.value: Tick to confirm you have read and agreed to the terms and conditions

data.name: BillDisclaimer
data.value: (Excluding phone calls & optional call features)

data.name: PremiumNumberExclusion
data.value: Please be aware that our call packages do not allow calls to be made to premium rate numbers beginning 09.

data.name: Accordion4AnytimeParagraph
data.value: Inclusive local, national and UK mobile calls at any time. Maximum duration for inclusive calls – 70 minutes per call, standard charge applies thereafter.

data.name: Accordion4AnytimePlusParagraph
data.value: Inclusive calls to local, national, UK mobiles and to 35 Band A international destinations at any time. Maximum duration for inclusive calls – 70 minutes per call, standard charge applies thereafter.

data.name: Accordion4EveningWeekendParagraph
data.value: Inclusive local, national and UK mobile calls from 7pm to 7 am weekdays and anytime at weekends up to midnight Sunday. Maximum duration for inclusive calls – 70 minutes per call. Standard charge applies thereafter.
